videos.description: Marcquise Reed pulls down the defensive board and pushes the tempo leading to Elijah Thomas climbing the ladder for the alley-oop.
videos.headline: Clemson's Thomas throws down transition alley-oop

videos.description: The Tigers found their stroke in the first half, knocking down six shots from beyond the arc.
videos.headline: Clemson finishes first half with six 3-pointers

videos.description: Lonnie Walker IV gets the inbound pass, drives to the bucket and rocks the rim with a one-handed jam.
videos.headline: Miami's Walker slams home posterizing dunk

videos.description: Chris Lykes drives to the hoop for the layup, but Mark Donnal has other ideas for the shot attempt.
videos.headline: Clemson's Donnal deploys the swat team on Lykes

videos.description: Donte Grantham gets the feed in the corner and drives baseline to throw down the big dunk.
videos.headline: Grantham brings the crowd to its feet with hammer

videos.description: Donte Grantham hangs out in the corner and gets the pass from Marcquise Reed for a 3-pointer that puts Clemson up by 9 late in the 2nd half.
videos.headline: Grantham nails clutch 3-pointer for Clemson
